synopsis.text:
His high school days dwindling, Takumi Kaizu finds himself surrounded by a bevy of female admirers, from his childhood friend Konami to the school's beloved idol, Wakana. Yet, despite his popularity, Takumi remains oblivious to matters of the heart. That is, until his best friend, Osamu, poses a simple yet profound question: "Is there any girl you love?"

Stirred by his friend's inquiry, Takumi begins to reassess his relationships with the women in his life. From the stoic Chiwa to his vivacious stepsister, Sana, and even his classmate Shinano with her fiery temper, Takumi embarks on a journey of self-discovery to find the one who holds the key to his heart.

As the summer of his final year unfolds, Takumi resolves to navigate the complexities of love and friendship, determined to find his own romantic connection amidst the whirlwind of high school life. Will he find the girl of his dreams, or will this summer be just another season of missed opportunities? Only time will tell in this heartwarming tale of love, friendship, and the thrill of young romance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
